About.title: About Me
About.bio1: I'm a senior engineer specializing in front-end technology exploration. I believe code is a tool for thought, and for many years I have been deeply involved in modern cutting-edge engineering systems, dedicated to creating elegant, efficient, and accessible user experiences.
About.bio2: The technological world is constantly evolving, and I always adhere to the principle of lifelong learning. Currently, my passion is focused on my efforts in artificial intelligence and front-end development, integrating research on how to leverage next-generation technologies such as large models, intelligent UIs, and enhanced interactions to create alternative product possibilities.
About.newsletterDesc: Get the latest articles and insights delivered straight to your inbox.

descriptions.job1: Led the frontend team in building Web and mobile low-code platforms using React and Node.js. Established robust Monorepo engineering capabilities and configurability.
descriptions.job2: Led the frontend team to build scalable Web applications and mobile pages using React and Node.js. Developed the core budget efficiency system and implemented page configurability.
descriptions.job3: Developed the company's core software platform, mobile platform, and IM system using the Angular 2+ framework. Collaborated closely with designers to implement a pixel-perfect UI component library.

Games.title: Games
Games.keybeatDesc: Turn your keyboard into a powerful synthesizer and percussion kit. Experience the fusion of code, design, and sound.
Games.dinoShort: A clone of the classic Chrome Dino game. Jump over obstacles and score points!

Dino.start: Press Space or Click to Start
Dino.gameOver: Game Over! Press Space or Click to Restart
Dino.jump: Press Space or Click to Jump
Dino.duck: Press Down or S to Duck
Dino.controls: SPACE/UP to Jump, DOWN/S to Duck
